name: Things Fall Apart
author: Chinua Achebe
description: A classic narrative about Africa's cataclysmic encounter with Europe as it establishes a colonial presence on the continent.

name: Homegoing
author: Yaa Gyasi
description: A novel spanning three hundred years in Ghana and following the lives of two half-sisters and their descendants through eight generations.

name: Americanah
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
description: A story of love and race centered around a young man and woman from Nigeria who face difficult choices and challenges in the countries they come to call home.

name: The-Fishermen
author: Chigozie Obioma
description: In a small town in western Nigeria, four young brothers—the two oldest, sixteen and fifteen—use their strict father's absence from home to go fishing at a forbidden river.

name: Ghana Must Go
author: Taiye Selasi
description: A powerful and moving story of a family of six, pulled apart by sorrow and circumstance, and the beautiful, painful reconciliation that brings them back together.
